hero.title: Optimize Asset Management with Data-Driven Intelligence
hero.description: Delve into detailed resource utilization and user interaction analytics, empowering content administrators to assess asset health and inform strategic decisions with MuseDAM's comprehensive data tools.
showcase.title: Accelerate Decision-Making with MuseDAM's Data Statistics
showcase.points.0.description: Uncover the vitality of your digital assets with comprehensive health analysis.
showcase.points.1.description: Illuminate the dynamics of asset-user interactions with detailed tracking.
showcase.points.2.description: Analyze user engagement patterns for assets through comprehensive monitoring.
showcase.points.3.description: Streamline data analysis with efficient filtering across various time scales.
showcase.points.4.description: Capture over 60 critical actions for in-depth operational transparency.
showcase.points.5.description: Track user operations to ensure the authorized handling of valuable assets.
text-display.title: MuseDAM Data Statistics: Empower Data-Driven Decisions
text-display.points.0.description: Delve into granular asset usage and engagement metrics for deeper insights.
text-display.points.1.description: "Power Your Decisions" Leverage detailed analytics and logs for strategic, data-informed decision-making.
text-display.points.2.description: Enhance productivity with efficient time-based data filtering capabilities.
text-display.points.3.description: Elevate your team's performance and asset management through data-driven strategies.
